thread.title: Joe
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Joe

author: Joe
title: Joe
text: Excellent service with minimal waiting. I have spent more time getting oil changed at competitors. This is my second visit for tire repair. I was not gouged on price either time. What I paid was incredibly reasonable. I won't even think twice about where to go when I need tires. Thanks.
